top_comments_top.body:
The only online collab I made was a beat where a rapper rapped on it. He found me by Instagram. 

Try to involve yourself in a scene. For example do a cappella or covers, and record it. With time you’ll speak with other musicians, and at one point of the conversation you’ll be able to say “I’m a singer but I have nobody to play with etc...” and the people you’re talking with might be interested, and then you can send them your demo records and ask them if they are interested in a collab. 

Good luck!
What kind of music ya plan on going for?
Maybe whatsapp and a decent webcam? I have tried to play music with someone this way and it sortof worked.
